author: Chris Morris
title: Bud Light Owes Philadelphia Free Beer After Super Bowl Victory | Fortune
text:
By Chris Morris 11:05 AM EST 
Anheuser-Busch spent millions of dollars on its Super Bowl ads , but that amount may pale in comparison to the bill it will run up fulfilling a promise to Philadelphia. 
On Aug. 2, 2017, Bud Light promised free beer for Philadelphians if the Eagles won the big game. (Technically, Eagles offensive tackle Lane Johnson did, but Bud Light stepped in to offer to pick up the tab.) Now that the Eagles have been declared Super Bowl champions , it‚Äôs time for Bud Light to pay up.
